definition: to pack and quit/to be sacked
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station

surname Ge
to pack one's things and leave

sentences.english: One in three workers will be gone.
sentences.chinese: 三分之一的工人会卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: If they didn't, they were going home.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有，就得卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: If you are late tomorrow, then you will pack yourself off .
sentences.chinese: 如果明天你迟到的话，那么卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: If you don't work well, you'd better pack up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不努力工作，最好还是卷铺盖走吧。
